revision.text:
This is the "FormActor" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormActor}}
{{{for template|Actor}}} {| class="formtable" ! Description: | {{{field|ActorDescription|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescription|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! StakeHolder: | {{{field|StakeHolder|input type=combobox|values from category=StakeHolder}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormAssumption" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormAssumption}}
{{{for template|Assumption}}} {| class="formtable" ! AssumptionDescription: | {{{field|AssumptionDescription|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescription|rows=10|cols=100}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormDependencies" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormDependencies}}
{{{for template|Dependencies}}} {| class="formtable" ! DependencyDescription: | {{{field|DependencyDescription|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescription|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Assumptions: | {{{field|Assumptions|mandatory|values from category=Assumption|list}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormFeature" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormFeature}}
{{{for template|Features}}} {| class="formtable" ! FeatureDescription: | {{{field|FeatureDescription|property=HasDescription|input type=textarea|mandatory|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Release: | {{{field|Release|mandatory}}} |- ! Need: | {{{field|Need|mandatory|values from category=Need|list|delimiter=,}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormFunRequirement" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormFunRequirement}}
{{{for template|FunctionalReq}}} {| class="formtable" ! FunDescription: | {{{field|FunDescription|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescription|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Features | {{{field|Features|mandatory|property=BelongsTo|values from category=Features|list}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormGlossary" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormGlossary}}
{{{for template|Glossary}}} {| class="formtable" ! Definition: | {{{field|Definition|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescription|rows=10|cols=100}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormGoal" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormGoal}}
{{{for template|Goal}}} {| class="formtable" ! Goal Description: | {{{field|GoalDesc|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescription|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Actor: | {{{field|Actor|mandatory|values from category=Actor|list}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormNeed" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormNeed}}
{{{for template|Need}}} {| class="formtable" ! NeedDescription: | {{{field|NeedDescription|input type=textarea|property=HasDescription|mandatory|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Priority: | {{{field|Priority|input type=combobox|mandatory|default=Normal|values=High,Normal,Low}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormNonFun" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormNonFun}}
{{{for template|NonFunctionalReq}}} {| class="formtable" ! Specification Type: | {{{field|NonFunType|input type=combobox|mandatory|property=HasNonFunType|values=Security,Maintainability,Accuracy,Usability,Safety,Scalability,Reliability,Interfaces,Regulation Compliance, Technical Compliance,Standards Compliance,Performance,Licensing Requirements,Design Constraint}}} |- ! NonFunDescription: | {{{field|NonFunDescription|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescription}}} |- ! Features | {{{field|Features|mandatory|property=BelongsTo|values from category=Features|list}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormProblem" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormProblem}}
{{{for template|Problem}}} {| class="formtable" ! Affects: | {{{field|Affects|mandatory|values from category=StakeHolder|list}}} |- ! Impact: | {{{field|Impact|mandatory|input type=textarea|property=HasImpact|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Successful Solution: | {{{field|SuccessfulSolution|mandatory|input type=textarea|property=HasSolution|rows=10|cols=100}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormProductPosition" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormProductPosition}}
{{{for template|ProductPosition}}} {| class="formtable" ! Who: | {{{field|Who|input type=textarea|mandatory|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! The: | {{{field|The|input type=textarea|mandatory|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! That: | {{{field|That|input type=textarea|mandatory|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Unlike: | {{{field|unlike|input type=textarea|mandatory|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! OurProduct: | {{{field|OurProduct|input type=textarea|mandatory|rows=10|cols=100}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormResponsibility" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormResponsibility}}
{{{for template|Responsibility}}} {| class="formtable" ! Description: | {{{field|Description|property=HasDescription| input type=textarea|rows=10|cols=100|mandatory}}} |- ! StakeHolder: | {{{field|StakeHolder|mandatory|values from category=StakeHolder|list}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormStakeHolder" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormStakeHolder}}
{{{for template|StakeHolder}}} {| class="formtable" ! StakeHolder Description: | {{{field|StakeHolderDescription|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescription|rows=10|cols=100}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormTestCases" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormTestCases}}
{{{for template|TestCases}}} {| class="formtable" ! Requirement: | {{{field|Req|mandatory|property=HasTestReq|values from category=Requirements|list}}} |- ! Type: | {{{field|Type|input type=combobox|mandatory|property=HasTestType|values=Sanity, Sanity Plus, Acceptance, Certification, Regular}}} |- ! Settings: | {{{field|Settings|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasTestSettings|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! PreConditions: | {{{field|PreConditions|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasTestPreConditions|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Description: | {{{field|Description|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescription|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Results: | {{{field|Results|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasTestResults|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! UseCases: | {{{field|UseCases|input type=combobox|mandatory|values from category=UseCase}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "FormUseCase" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=FormUseCase}}
{{{for template|UseCase}}} {| class="formtable" ! Use Case Description: | {{{field|Description|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasDescriptions|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Level: | {{{field|Level|input type=combobox|mandatory|property=HasUseCaseLevel|default=user-goal|values=subfunction}}} |- ! Primary Actor: | {{{field|PrimaryActor|mandatory|property=UCActorBelongsTo|values from category=Actor|list}}} |- ! StakeHolders: |{{{field|StakeHolders|mandatory|property=UCStakeHolderBelongsTo|values from category=StakeHolder|list}}} |- ! Interests: | {{{field|Interests|input type=textarea|property=HasInterests|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! PreConditions: | {{{field|PreConditions|input type=textarea|property=HasPreConditions|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! PostConditions |- ! SuccessEndCondition: | {{{field|SuccessEndCondition|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasSuccessEndCondition|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! FailureEndCondition: | {{{field|FailureEndCondition|input type=textarea|property=HasFailureEndCondition|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! MinimalGuarantee: | {{{field|MinimalGuarantee|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=HasMinimalGuarantee|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! MainSuccessScenario: | {{{field|MainSuccessScenario|input type=textarea|property=HasMainSuccessScenario|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Extensions: | {{{field|Extensions|input type=textarea|property=HasExtensions|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! SpecialRequirements: | {{{field|SpecialRequirements|input type=textarea|property=HasSpecialRequirements|rows=10|cols=100}}} |- ! Features: | {{{field|Features|mandatory|values from category=Features|list}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "Actor" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Actor
|ActorDescription=
|StakeHolder=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{ActorDescription|}}}]] |- ! StakeHolder | [[BelongsTo::{{{StakeHolder|}}}]] |} [[Category:Actor]] [[Category:Actor]]

This is the "Assumption" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Assumption
|AssumptionDescription=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{AssumptionDescription|}}}]] |} [[Category:Assumption]] [[Category:Assumption]]

This is the "Dependencies" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Dependencies
|DependencyDescription=
|Assumptions=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{DependencyDescription|}}}]] |- ! Assumptions | {{#arraymap:{{{Assumptions|}}}|,|x|[[BelongsTo::x]]}} |} [[Category:Dependencies]]

This is the "Features" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Features
|FeatureDescription=
|Release=
|Need=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{FeatureDescription|}}}]] |- ! Planned Release | [[HasRelease::{{{Release|}}}]] |- ! Need | {{#arraymap:{{{Need|}}}|,|x|[[BelongsTo::x]]}} |} [[Category:Features]]

This is the "FunctionalReq" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{FunctionalReq
|FunDescription=
|Features=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{FunDescription|}}}]] |- ! Features | {{#arraymap:{{{Features|}}}|,|x|[[BelongsTo::x]]}} |} [[Category:FunctionalityReq]]

This is the "Glossary" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Glossary
|Definition=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Definition | [[HasDescription::{{{Definition|}}}]] |} [[Category:Glossary]]

This is the "Goal" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Goal
|GoalDesc=
|Actor=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{GoalDesc|}}}]] |- ! Actor | {{#arraymap:{{{Actor|}}}|,|x|[[BelongsTo::x]]}} |} [[Category:Goal]]
{{#ask: [[hasType::{{{type}}}]] |?{{{type}}}={{{type}}} Entities Found |format=table |headers=plain |default=No pages found! |mainlabel=Page Name }}

This is the "Need" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Need
|NeedDescription=
|Priority=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{NeedDescription|}}}]] |- ! Priority | [[HasPriority::{{{Priority|}}}]] |} [[Category:Need]]

This is the "NonFunctionalReq" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{NonFunctionalReq
|NonFunType=
|NonFunDescription=
|Features=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Type | [[HasNonFunType::{{{NonFunType|}}}]] |- ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{NonFunDescription|}}}]] |- ! Features | {{#arraymap:{{{Features|}}}|,|x|[[BelongsTo::x]]}} |} [[Category:NonFunctionalReq]]

This is the "Problem" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Problem
|Affects=
|Impact=
|SuccessfulSolution=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Affects | {{#arraymap:{{{Affects|}}}|,|x|[[BelongsTo::x]]}} |- ! The Impact of which is | [[HasImpact::{{{Impact|}}}]] |- ! A successful solution would be | [[HasSolution::{{{SuccessfulSolution|}}}]] |} [[Category:Problem]]

This is the "ProductPostion" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{ProductPosition
|Who=
|The=
|That=
|unlike=
|OurProduct=
}}
{| class="wikitable" ! Who | [[HasWho::{{{Who|}}}]] |- ! The ''Project Name'' | [[HasProjectName::{{{The|}}}]] |- ! That | [[HasThat::{{{That|}}}]] |- ! Unlike | [[HasUnlike::{{{unlike|}}}]] |- ! Our Product | [[HasOurProduct::{{{OurProduct|}}}]] |} [[Category:ProductPosition]]

This is the "Responsibility" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Responsibility
|Description=
|StakeHolder=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{Description|}}}]] |- ! StakeHolder | {{#arraymap:{{{StakeHolder|}}}|,|x|[[BelongsTo::x]]}} |} [[Category:Responsibility]]
{{{content}}}
<noinclude>{{{serviceName}}} {{{doc}}}</noinclude>
'''{{{serviceName}}}''' on {{{doc}}} [{{{url}}} (View)]
{| class="wikitable" style="height:50px" ! Content ! width="80" | Type ! width="50" style="text-align: center;"| Start ! width="50" style="text-align: center;"| End ! Features

This is the "StakeHolder" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{StakeHolder
|StakeHolderDescription=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! StakeHolder Description | [[HasDescription::{{{StakeHolderDescription|}}}]] |} [[Category:StakeHolder]]

This is the "TestCases" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{TestCases
|Requirement=
|Type=
|Settings=
|PreConditions=
|Description=
|Results=
|UseCases=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Requirements | {{#arraymap:{{{Req|}}}|,|x|[[HasTestReq::x]]}} |- ! Type | [[HasTestType::{{{Type|}}}]] |- ! Settings | [[HasTestSettings::{{{Settings|}}}]] |- ! PreConditions | [[HasTestPreCondition::{{{PreConditions|}}}]] |- ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{Description|}}}]] |- ! Results | [[HasTestResults::{{{Results|}}}]] |- ! UseCases | {{#arraymap:{{{UseCases|}}}|,|x|[[BelongsTo::x]]}} |} [[Category:TestCases]]

This is the "UseCase" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{UseCase
|Description=
|Level=
|Primary Actor=
|StakeHolders=
|Interests=
|PreConditions=
|SuccessEndCondition=
|FailureEndCondition=
|MinimalGuarantee=
|MainSuccessScenario=
|Extensions=
|SpecialRequirements=
|Features=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Description | [[HasDescription::{{{Description|}}}]] |- ! Level | [[HasUseCaseLevel::{{{Level|}}}]] |- ! Primary Actor | {{#arraymap:{{{PrimaryActor|}}}|,|x|[[UCActorBelongsTo::x]]}} |- ! StakeHolders | {{#arraymap:{{{StakeHolders|}}}|,|x|[[UCStakeHolderBelongsTo::x]]}} |- ! Interests | [[HasInterests::{{{Interests|}}}]] |- ! Pre-Conditions | [[HasPreConditions::{{{PreConditions|}}}]] |- ! Success end condition | [[HasSuccessEndCondition::{{{SuccessEndCondition|}}}]] |- ! Failure end condition | [[HasFailureEndCondition::{{{FailureEndCondition|}}}]] |- ! Minimal Guarantee | [[HasMinimalGuarantee::{{{MinimalGuarantee|}}}]] |- ! Main Success Scenario | [[HasMainSuccessScenario::{{{MainSuccessScenario|}}}]] |- ! Extensions | [[HasExtensions::{{{Extensions|}}}]] |- ! Special Requirements | [[HasSpecialRequirements::{{{SpecialRequirements|}}}]] |- ! Features | {{#arraymap:{{{Features|}}}|,|x|[[BelongsTo::x]]}} |} [[Category:UseCase]]
Default type for concepts
Datatype of text properties, e.g. Descriptions

=Introduction= ==Purpose== ==Scope== ==Definitions, Acronyms and Abbreviations== ==References== ==Overview == =Functional Requirement= [[Form:FormFunRequirement| Create a functional requirement]]
{{#ask: [[Category:FunctionalityReq]] | mainlabel= Functionality Requirement | ?HasDescription= Description | ?BelongsTo = Features | format= table }}
=Non-Functional Requirement= [[Form:FormNonFun| Create a non-functional requirement]]
{{#ask: [[Category:NonFunctionalReq]] | mainlabel= Non-Functionality Requirement | ?HasDescription= Description | ?HasNonFunType = Type | ?BelongsTo = Features | format= table }} =Licensing Requirements= =Legal, Copyright and Other Notices= =Applicable Standards= =Test Cases= [[Form:FormTestCases| Create a test case]]
{{#ask: [[Category:TestCases]] | mainlabel=TestCase Title | ?HasTestReq= Requirement | ?HasTestType =Type | ?HasTestSettings = Settings | ?HasTestPreCondition =Preconditions | ?HasDescription = Descriptions | ? HasTestResults=Results |format= table }} =Traceability Links= == User Needs versus Features == {{#ask: [[Category:Features]] |?BelongsTo=Need |? = Feature | mainlabel=- | format= table }} ==Features versus Use Cases == {{#ask: [[Category:UseCase]] |? = UseCases |?BelongsTo=Features | mainlabel=- | format= table }} ==Features versus Supplementary Requirements== {{#ask: [[Category:FunctionalityReq]] |?BelongsTo=Features |? = Functional Requirements | mainlabel=- | format= table }}
{{#ask: [[Category:NonFunctionalReq]] |?BelongsTo=Features |? = Non Functional Requirements | mainlabel=- | format= table }}
{{#ask: [[Category:Requirements]] |?BelongsTo=Features |? = Supplementary Requirements | mainlabel=- | format= table }} ==Use Cases to Test Cases== {{#ask: [[Category:TestCases]] |?BelongsTo=UseCase |? = TestCases | mainlabel=- | format= table }} =Glossary= [[Form:FormGlossary| Create a new term]]
{{#ask: [[Category:Glossary]] | mainlabel=Term | ?HasDescription= Definition | format= table }}

=Actor-Goal List= [[Form:FormActor| Create an actor]]
[[Form:FormGoal| Create a goal]]
{{#ask: [[Category:Actor]] | mainlabel=Actor | ?HasDescription= Description | format= table }}
{{#ask: [[Category:Goal]] | mainlabel=Goal | ?HasDescription= Description | format= table }}
{{#ask: [[Category:Goal]] | ?BelongsTo = Actor | ?=Goal | mainlabel=- | format= table }} =UseCaseModel= [[Form:FormUseCase| Create a use case]] {{#ask: [[Category:UseCase]] | ?=UseCaseName | ?HasDescription = Description | ?HasUseCaseLevel = Level | ?UCActorBelongsTo = Primary Actor | ?UCStakeHolderBelongsTo = StakeHolder | ?HasInterests = Interests | ?HasPreConditions = PreConditions | ?HasSuccessEndCondition= SuccessEndCondition | ?HasFailureEndCondition=FailureEndCondition | ?HasMinimalGuarantee=MinimalGuarantee | ?HasMainSuccessScenario=MainSuccessScenario | ?HasExtensions=Extensions | ?HasSpecialRequirements=SpecialRequirements | ?BelongsTo =Features | mainlabel=- | format =template | template=UseCaseResult }} =Glossary= [[Form:FormGlossary| Create a new term]]
{{#ask: [[Category:Glossary]] | mainlabel=Term | ?HasDescription= Definition | format= table }}

=Introduction= =Positioning= ==Problem Statement== [[Form:FormStakeHolder | Create a stakeholder]]
[[Form:FormProblem | Create a problem]]
{{#ask: [[Category:Problem]] | mainlabel=The problem of |?BelongsTo=StakeHolder |?HasImpact=The Impact of Which is |?HasSolution=A Successful Solution would be | format= table }}
==Product Position Statement== [[Form:FormProductPosition| Create a product position]]
{{#ask: [[Category:ProductPosition]] | mainlabel=For |?HasWho=Who |?HasProjectName=The [Project Name] |?HasThat=That |?HasUnlike =Unlike |?HasOurProduct =OurProduct | format= table }}
=Stakeholder Descriptions= ==Stakeholder Summary== [[Form:FormResponsibility| Create a responsibility]]
{{#ask: [[Category:StakeHolder]] | mainlabel=StakeHolder | ?HasDescription= Description | format= table }}
{{#ask: [[Category:Responsibility]] | ? =Responsibility | ?HasDescription= Description | mainlabel=- | format= table }}
{{#ask: [[Category:Responsibility]] | ?BelongsTo=StakeHolder | ? =Responsibility | mainlabel=- | format= table }}
